metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10970 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in link.php in Cacti 1.1.12 allowsremote anonymous users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the idparameter, related to the die_html_input_error function inlib/html_validate.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.12+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.12+ds1-1').
